content:

thought: In order to craft a lime banner, we need to have a stick and lime wool. We currently do not have any sticks, so we will start by crafting one. The closest bamboo is in slot 20, so we will move it to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
